casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher B. SMITH No. 119PA18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Smith, Christopher B. Tiffany Y. Lucas, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 16th of May 2018 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
